title: Cleveland Hopkins Airport pledges revamped snowplow plan, denies FAA's allegations of runway safety hazards
text:
Cleveland Hopkins Airport pledges revamped snowplow plan, denies FAA's allegations of runway safety hazards 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Today 
The city of Cleveland issued a written response Friday to the Federal Aviation Administration's findings that the Hopkins Airport violated i...
